messages.message:
feedback on search - query did not work when all drives/connectors were selected, but the same query did with just the sales drive:

@margaret.tomaszczuk

Looks like we are able to retrieve the right chunks from weaviate when the scope is narrow. When all the drives/connectors are queried, there are matches from irrelevant drives and the right chunks are not making the cut. Will take a deeper look at the scores and sorting that we do to rank the chunk candidates to see ways this can be fixed.
